components.tooltip: Select a valid policy period from the list
components.label: Panel
Footnotes
components.content:
The insurance costs include a premium, a $26 PADI Administration fee, plus applicable taxes and fees.
  1. Premium fully earned means there is no refund if you cancel your insurance. This does not apply to the PADI Dive Store/Resort Instructional Policy.
  2. Divemaster/Assistant Instructor Assisting Only option provides coverage to Divemasters and Assistant Instructors ONLY while assisting insured instructors with classes.
  3. Available for non U.S. citizens teaching ONLY non U.S. citizens; not available in Australia, Canada, Japan, the Caribbean or U.S., it's territories and possessions.
  4. No coverage will be afforded for any Open Water Scuba Instructor who teaches any form of scuba diving or snorkeling during the policy period.
  5. Please fax, email or upload a copy of your Technical Certification along with a copy of your confirmation notice to (714) 739-3188 or email instructors@diveinsurance.com.
  6. Please fax, email or upload a copy of your Scuba Fit, Cylinder Inspector, or Cylinder Instructor Certification along with a copy of your confirmation notice to (714) 739-3188 or email instructors@diveinsurance.com.

validate.customMessage: Please accept these declarations

components.label: Content
components.content:
1. I hereby declare that I have read, understand and accept the Exclusions included with this renewal. [Read Exclusions]
    2.  
  2. I hearby declare that I am the applicant listed in Step 1, and the premium is fully earned, and no refund will be given if I cancel the policy.

components.label: AdditionalInsureds
components.content:
1. Additional Insureds are only added if required by written contract.
  2. No charge for Additional Insureds, however, all must be listed.
  3. Entities other than those mentioned, when listed, will be reviewed by the insurance carrier; inclusion on your Certificate of Insurance will indicate that coverage is in effect.
  4. List business relationship versus personal relationship; eg., "Bob Smith, property owner" not "Bob Smith, father".
  5. Other Instructors and assistants may not be Additional Insureds but must obtain their own insurance.
